EmailTemplate.description: This is used to send a collection notification to the RL team who then organise a collection with the supplier
EmailTemplate.name: Organise Collection Customer Email 1.0
EmailTemplate.subject: Collection Requested by Customer - {!Job__c.Name} | {!Job__c.Site__c} | {!Job__c.Collection_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
This is a notification to inform you that the customer {!User.Name} ({!User.Email}) has requested a collection for the following job {!Job__c.Link}. Please organise this collection with the supplier.
Details:
Site: {!Job__c.Site__c} {!Job__c.Site_Address__c}
Client Notes: {!Job__c.Client_Notes__c}
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to get in touch.
Regards
Recycling Lives
